label: original_epc_datatype
comment: The datatype of a EPC variable, as given in the EPC guidance notes.

label: csvw_datatype
comment: The CSVW datatype of a epc_vocab Property.

label: LMK_KEY
comment: Individual lodgement identifier. Guaranteed to be unique and can be used to identify a certificate in the downloads and the API.

label: ADDRESS1
comment: First line of the address

label: ADDRESS2
comment: Second line of the address

label: ADDRESS3
comment: Third line of the address

label: POSTCODE
comment: The postcode of the property

label: BUILDING_REFERENCE_NUMBER
comment: Unique identifier for the property.

label: CURRENT_ENERGY_RATING
comment: Current energy rating converted into a linear 'A to G' rating (where A is the most energy efficient and G is the least energy efficient)

label: POTENTIAL_ENERGY_RATING
comment: Estimated potential energy rating converted into a linear 'A to G' rating (where A is the most energy efficient and G is the least energy efficient)

label: CURRENT_ENERGY_EFFICIENCY
comment: Based on cost of energy, i.e. energy required for space heating, water heating and lighting [in kWh/year] multiplied by fuel costs. (£/m²/year where cost is derived from kWh).

label: POTENTIAL_ENERGY_EFFICIENCY
comment: The potential energy efficiency rating of the property.

label: PROPERTY_TYPE
comment: Describes the type of property such as House, Flat, Maisonette etc. This is the type differentiator for dwellings.

label: BUILT_FORM
comment: The building type of the Property e.g. Detached, Semi-Detached, Terrace etc. Together with the Property Type, the Build Form produces a structured description of the property

label: INSPECTION_DATE
comment: The date that the inspection was actually carried out by the energy assessor

label: LOCAL_AUTHORITY
comment: Office for National Statistics (ONS) code. Local authority area in which the building is located.

label: CONSTITUENCY
comment: Office for National Statistics (ONS) code. Parliamentary constituency in which the building is located.

label: COUNTY
comment: County in which the building is located (where applicable)

label: LODGEMENT_DATE
comment: Date lodged on the Energy Performance of Buildings Register

label: TRANSACTION_TYPE
comment: Type of transaction that triggered EPC. For example, one of: marketed sale; non-marketed sale; new-dwelling; rental; not sale or rental; assessment for Green Deal; following Green Deal; FIT application; none of the above; RHI application; ECO assessment. Where the reason for the assessment is unknown by the energy assessor the transaction type will be recorded as 'none of the above'. Transaction types may be changed over time.

label: ENVIRONMENT_IMPACT_CURRENT
comment: The Environmental Impact Rating. A measure of the property's current impact on the environment in terms of carbon dioxide (CO₂) emissions. The higher the rating the lower the CO₂ emissions. (CO₂ emissions in tonnes / year)

label: ENVIRONMENT_IMPACT_POTENTIAL
comment: The potential Environmental Impact Rating. A measure of the property's potential impact on the environment in terms of carbon dioxide (CO₂) emissions after improvements have been carried out. The higher the rating the lower the CO₂ emissions. (CO₂ emissions in tonnes / year)

label: ENERGY_CONSUMPTION_CURRENT
comment: Current estimated total energy consumption for the property in a 12 month period (kWh/m2). Displayed on EPC as the current primary energy use per square metre of floor area.

label: ENERGY_CONSUMPTION_POTENTIAL
comment: Estimated potential total energy consumption for the Property in a 12 month period. Value is Kilowatt Hours per Square Metre (kWh/m²)

label: CO2_EMISSIONS_CURRENT
comment: CO₂ emissions per year in tonnes/year.

label: CO2_EMISS_CURR_PER_FLOOR_AREA
comment: CO₂ emissions per square metre floor area per year in kg/m²

label: CO2_EMISSIONS_POTENTIAL
comment: Estimated value in Tonnes per Year of the total CO₂ emissions produced by the Property in 12 month period.

label: LIGHTING_COST_CURRENT
comment: GBP. Current estimated annual energy costs for lighting the property.

label: LIGHTING_COST_POTENTIAL
comment: GBP. Potential estimated annual energy costs for lighting the property after improvements have been made.

label: HEATING_COST_CURRENT
comment: GBP. Current estimated annual energy costs for heating the property.

label: HEATING_COST_POTENTIAL
comment: GBP. Potential annual energy costs for lighting the property after improvements have been made.

label: HOT_WATER_COST_CURRENT
comment: GBP. Current estimated annual energy costs for hot water

label: HOT_WATER_COST_POTENTIAL
comment: GBP. Potential estimated annual energy costs for hot water after improvements have been made.

label: TOTAL_FLOOR_AREA
comment: The total useful floor area is the total of all enclosed spaces measured to the internal face of the external walls, i.e. the gross floor area as measured in accordance with the guidance issued from time to time by the Royal Institute of Chartered Surveyors or by a body replacing that institution. (m²)

label: ENERGY_TARIFF
comment: Type of electricity tariff for the property, e.g. single.

label: MAINS_GAS_FLAG
comment: Whether mains gas is available. Yes means that there is a gas meter or a gas-burning appliance in the dwelling. A closed-off gas pipe does not count.

label: FLOOR_LEVEL
comment: Flats and maisonettes only. Floor level relative to the lowest level of the property (0 for ground floor). If there is a basement, the basement is level 0 and the other floors are from 1 upwards

label: FLAT_TOP_STOREY
comment: Whether the flat is on the top storey

label: FLAT_STOREY_COUNT
comment: The number of storeys in the apartment block.

label: MAIN_HEATING_CONTROLS
comment: Type of main heating controls. Includes both main heating systems if there are two.

label: MULTI_GLAZE_PROPORTION
comment: The estimated banded range (e.g. 0% - 10%) of the total glazed area of the Property that is multiple glazed.

label: GLAZED_TYPE
comment: The type of glazing. From British Fenestration Rating Council or manufacturer declaration, one of; single; double; triple.

label: GLAZED_AREA
comment: Ranged estimate of the total glazed area of the Habitable Area.

label: EXTENSION_COUNT
comment: The number of extensions added to the property. Between 0 and 4.

label: NUMBER_HABITABLE_ROOMS
comment: Habitable rooms include any living room, sitting room, dining room, bedroom, study and similar; and also a non-separated conservatory. A kitchen/diner having a discrete seating area (with space for a table and four chairs) also counts as a habitable room. A non-separated conservatory adds to the habitable room count if it has an internal quality door between it and the dwelling. Excluded from the room count are any room used solely as a kitchen, utility room, bathroom, cloakroom, en-suite accommodation and similar and any hallway, stairs or landing; and also any room not having a window.

label: NUMBER_HEATED_ROOMS
comment: The number of heated rooms in the property if more than half of the habitable rooms are not heated.

label: LOW_ENERGY_LIGHTING
comment: The percentage of low energy lighting present in the property as a percentage of the total fixed lights in the property. 0% indicates that no low-energy lighting is present.

label: NUMBER_OPEN_FIREPLACES
comment: The number of Open Fireplaces in the Property. An Open Fireplace is a fireplace that still allows air to pass between the inside of the Property and the outside.

label: HOTWATER_DESCRIPTION
comment: Overall description of the property feature

label: HOT_WATER_ENERGY_EFF
comment: Energy efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

label: HOT_WATER_ENV_EFF
comment: Environmental efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

label: FLOOR_DESCRIPTION
comment: Overall description of the property feature

label: FLOOR_ENERGY_EFF
comment: Energy efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

label: FLOOR_ENV_EFF
comment: Environmental efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

label: WINDOWS_DESCRIPTION
comment: Overall description of the property feature

label: WINDOWS_ENERGY_EFF
comment: Energy efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

label: WINDOWS_ENV_EFF
comment: WINDOWS. Environmental efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

label: WALLS_DESCRIPTION
comment: Overall description of the property feature

label: WALLS_ENERGY_EFF
comment: Energy efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

label: WALLS_ENV_EFF
comment: Environmental efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

label: SECONDHEAT_DESCRIPTION
comment: Overall description of the property feature

label: SHEATING_ENERGY_EFF
comment: Energy efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

label: SHEATING_ENV_EFF
comment: Environmental efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

label: ROOF_DESCRIPTION
comment: Overall description of the property feature

label: ROOF_ENERGY_EFF
comment: Energy efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

label: ROOF_ENV_EFF
comment: Environmental efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

label: MAINHEAT_DESCRIPTION
comment: Overall description of the property feature

label: MAINHEAT_ENERGY_EFF
comment: Energy efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

label: MAINHEAT_ENV_EFF
comment: Environmental efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

label: MAINHEATCONT_DESCRIPTION
comment: Overall description of the property feature

label: MAINHEATC_ENERGY_EFF
comment: Energy efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

label: MAINHEATC_ENV_EFF
comment: Environmental efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

label: LIGHTING_DESCRIPTION
comment: Overall description of property feature. Total number of fixed lighting outlets and total number of low-energy fixed lighting outlets

label: LIGHTING_ENERGY_EFF
comment: Energy efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

label: LIGHTING_ENV_EFF
comment: Environmental efficiency rating. One of: very good; good; average; poor; very poor. On actual energy certificate shown as one to five star rating.

label: MAIN_FUEL
comment: The type of fuel used to power the central heating e.g. Gas, Electricity

label: WIND_TURBINE_COUNT
comment: Number of wind turbines; 0 if none.

label: HEAT_LOSS_CORRIDOR
comment: Flats and maisonettes only. Indicates that the flat contains a corridor through which heat is lost. Heat loss corridor, one of: no corridor; heated corridor; unheated corridor

label: UNHEATED_CORRIDOR_LENGTH
comment: The total length of unheated corridor in the flat. Only populated if flat or maisonette contains unheated corridor. If unheated corridor, length of sheltered wall (m²).

label: FLOOR_HEIGHT
comment: Average height of the storey in metres.

label: PHOTO_SUPPLY
comment: Percentage of photovoltaic area as a percentage of total roof area. 0% indicates that a Photovoltaic Supply is not present in the property.

label: SOLAR_WATER_HEATING_FLAG
comment: Indicates whether the heating in the Property is solar powered.

label: MECHANICAL_VENTILATION
comment: Identifies the type of mechanical ventilation the property has. This is required for the RdSAP calculation.

label: ADDRESS
comment: Field containing the concatenation of address1, address2 and address3. Note that post code is recorded separately.

label: LOCAL_AUTHORITY_LABEL
comment: The name of the local authority area in which the building is located. This field is for additional information only and should not be relied upon: please refer to the Local Authority ONS Code.

label: CONSTITUENCY_LABEL
comment: The name of the parliamentary constituency in which the building is located. This field is for additional information only and should not be relied upon: please refer to the Constituency ONS Code.

label: POSTTOWN
comment: The post town of the property

label: LODGEMENT_DATETIME
comment: Date and time lodged on the Energy Performance of Buildings Register.

label: TENURE
comment: Describes the tenure type of the property. One of: Owner-occupied; Rented (social); Rented (private).

label: FIXED_LIGHTING_OUTLETS_COUNT
comment: The number of fixed lighting outlets.

label: LOW_ENERGY_FIXED_LIGHT_COUNT
comment: The number of low-energy fixed lighting outlets.

label: UPRN
comment: The UPRN submitted by an assessor or alternatively from the department’s address matching algorithm.

label: UPRN_SOURCE
comment: Populated with the values "Energy Assessor" or "Address Matched" to show how the UPRN was populated
